What should be discussed before playing a horror game?
The limits of what players find acceptable and any specific topics they do not want to see in the game.

How can you handle a topic that one player object to in the game?
Either avoid the topic entirely or use the dramatic effect of "fading to black" when it occurs in play.

Why is it important to draw a clear line between social time and game time?
To ensure a good atmosphere and avoid distractions during the game.

To share news, tell jokes, and relax before the game begins.

What should be asked of players regarding their objections?
Ask your players if there is anything that they definitely do not want to see in the game.

How should a player's objection be handled?
Establish the level of their objection and either avoid the topic entirely or use the dramatic effect of “fading to black” when it occurs in play.

Distasteful Historical Themes, such as racism, xenophobia, religious bias, and sexual discrimination.

What was the social context regarding racism and discrimination in the 1920s?
Racism, xenophobia, religious bias, and sexual discrimination were part of everyday life and often loudly espoused in the 1920s.

Racism, xenophobia, religious bias, and sexual discrimination
